businessProfile.name: Mignano's Pizza Pasta Subs
businessProfile.address: 76 Red Lion Ave, Felton, PA 17322, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 76 Red Lion Ave, Felton, PA 17322, USA

reviews.text: The food is excellent. Love the owner and have known him for years, just from always getting his food. It has always been excellent. I'm just glad he's back in the area. Will be ordering from here often! You should too!

We have been searching for a great pizza in the York area for years! We finally found our gold mine. This by far is the best pizza in York county and we've tried a lot of them. The funny thing is it's 5 minutes from her house. We never thought to look so close to home. We didn't think we could be so lucky, but we are. Crust is perfect cheese is nice and buttery. We've ordered twice now in the last week and our experience has been 100%. It says a lot to me if you get great customer service over the phone which this little pizza shop nails it. Look no further. You got to give this place a try. It's fabulous.

Ordered online, order never showed up. When I called to ask about my order, the lady rushed and said I don‚Äôt see your food here so it should be there any minute I‚Äôm sorry for the delay. Ok cool I‚Äôll wait. Waited another 45  (total of two hours) mins and nothing showed. When I called back I was told my food should have been delivered then she proceeded to tell me she never got my order. Ok thank you however if she would have taken a minute to look the first time I called I could have placed a new order or ordered somewhere else instead she proceeded to argue with me. So I ended the call she then called back to apologize but couldn‚Äôt actually apologize or even let me talk. As a business owner myself, that‚Äôs very poor customer service. I understand things happen but that was definitely handled improperly and for that alone I won‚Äôt be ordering from there anymore.

My kids and wife are always asking for Mignanos. Although none of them can pronounce it correctly lol. Sal is great, and Cynthia is so sweet. We love their pizza. I've also gotten the Tour of Italy and really enjoyed it. My son and daughter love their chicken fingers.

I hate to give negative reviews, but I was incredibly disappointed in our order earlier this week. We've gotten fantastic, consistently great food here many times over the years, which is why I'm really surprised that this happened. I realize food costs, fuel prices, etc. have skyrocketed, so I fully understand the price of my order. My gripe is the portion sizes & quality of what we received for an almost $80 order.
Pictured above is the $9 "large" Caesar salad. That's a medium clam shell takeout box; salad had exactly 2 olives, 3 grape tomatoes sliced in half, some cheap parmesan dusted on top, and a packet of dressing. We figured there had been a mistake, but after a phone call to check, nope! That's the large. One of the pizzas was undercooked. The other had super skimpy toppings and was so dried out and tough. I was told the 2 "large" subs (which also arrived in those medium boxes) were good, so there's that.
I hope this was just an off night because I'm hesitant to order from here again. :(

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

recentReviews.text: My kids and wife are always asking for Mignanos. Although none of them can pronounce it correctly lol. Sal is great, and Cynthia is so sweet. We love their pizza. I've also gotten the Tour of Italy and really enjoyed it. My son and daughter love their chicken fingers.

recentReviews.author: Kevin B
recentReviews.text: The food is excellent. Love the owner and have known him for years, just from always getting his food. It has always been excellent. I'm just glad he's back in the area. Will be ordering from here often! You should too!

recentReviews.author: Rottiemom
recentReviews.text: We have been searching for a great pizza in the York area for years! We finally found our gold mine. This by far is the best pizza in York county and we've tried a lot of them. The funny thing is it's 5 minutes from her house. We never thought to look so close to home. We didn't think we could be so lucky, but we are. Crust is perfect cheese is nice and buttery. We've ordered twice now in the last week and our experience has been 100%. It says a lot to me if you get great customer service over the phone which this little pizza shop nails it. Look no further. You got to give this place a try. It's fabulous.

recentReviews.author: farmgirl9923
recentReviews.text:
I hate to give negative reviews, but I was incredibly disappointed in our order earlier this week. We've gotten fantastic, consistently great food here many times over the years, which is why I'm really surprised that this happened. I realize food costs, fuel prices, etc. have skyrocketed, so I fully understand the price of my order. My gripe is the portion sizes & quality of what we received for an almost $80 order.
Pictured above is the $9 "large" Caesar salad. That's a medium clam shell takeout box; salad had exactly 2 olives, 3 grape tomatoes sliced in half, some cheap parmesan dusted on top, and a packet of dressing. We figured there had been a mistake, but after a phone call to check, nope! That's the large. One of the pizzas was undercooked. The other had super skimpy toppings and was so dried out and tough. I was told the 2 "large" subs (which also arrived in those medium boxes) were good, so there's that.
I hope this was just an off night because I'm hesitant to order from here again. :(

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.6/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the excellent quality of the food, particularly the pizza, which is described as having a perfect crust and buttery cheese. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The personal connection and friendly customer service, especially over the phone, are highly valued by customers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant's convenient location is a pleasant surprise for customers who have been searching for great pizza nearby. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Poor customer service and order handling - review management can address this concern
Inconsistent food quality and portion sizes - review management can address this concern
Negative perception due to past experiences - Boostly marketing services can improve this

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
